name: The 100% Official* Liz McColgan's Running Power
name_original: The 100% Official* Liz McColgan's Running Power
description:
Can you emulate the great Liz McColgan's* 1996 triumph and win the London Marathon. Let's find out in this 'Track & Field' inspired game.

*This is a work of fiction. Names, events and incidents are either the products of the designer's imagination or used in a fictitious manner. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.
